subtitle: Serve this romantic meal with baby new potatoes.

method.text: Heat the oil in a ridged or non-stick frying pan. Season the lamb and fry on both sides for about 5-8 min until browned. Carefully remove the meat from the frying pan and keep warm.
Add the leeks, wholegrain mustard, pepper corns and lemon juice to the pan and cook for 3 min.
Add the rosemary, brandy and redcurrant jelly to the pan. Cook gently for 3-4 min until the jelly has melted and the sauce has started to bubble.
Pour the sauce over the cooked lamb and serve immediately on warmed serving plates. Garnish with sprigs of rosemary.

title: Valentine lamb
